word_mean: 峡，峡部：两较大部分之间的狭窄连接部

sentence.Network_en: North America is connected with South America by the Isthmus of Panama.
sentence.Network_cn: 巴拿马海峡把北美同南美连接起来.

sentence.Network_en: The north and south of the island are linked by a narrow isthmus.
sentence.Network_cn: 岛的北部和南部由一条狭窄的地峡相连.

sentence.Network_en: It was the neck of land which we call the Isthmus of Panama.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个陆地的狭窄地带,我们称之为巴拿马地峡.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 地字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 地图册〖 atlas〗 地峡〖 isthmus〗 地下〖 underground〗.
椎弓峡部(isthmus):又称关节间部(pars interarticularis)。位于椎弓根与椎板连接处，上、下关节突之间，沿下方行走。
...骨部约占其内侧2／3。外耳道有两处较狭窄，一为骨部与软骨部交界处，另一处为骨部距鼓膜约0.5cm处，后者称外耳道峡（isthmus）。外耳道略呈s形弯曲：外段向内、向前而微向上；中段向内、向后；内段向内、向前而微向下。故在检查外耳道.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent.: via Latin from Greek isthmos

entry.def: An isthmus is a narrow piece of land connecting two very large areas of land.

means.word_mean: 1. a relatively narrow strip of land (with water on both sides) connecting two larger land areas
2. a narrow band of tissue connecting two larger parts of an anatomical structure

auth_sentence.content: Panama signs treaty with US allowing it to build a railway across the isthmus.
